text:
Nasim Pedrad (; born November 18, 1981) is an Iranian-born American actress and comedian. She was born in Tehran, Iran and emigrated to Irvine, California in 1984. She is best known for her five seasons as a cast member on "Saturday Night Live" from 2009 to 2014.
After "SNL", she went on to co-star in sitcoms such as "Mulaney", "Scream Queens", "People of Earth", and "New Girl".
